attributes.action: HELP PEOPLE WHO GET DONE FOR ACCIDENTLYNG CAUSING HARM FOR THERE SAFETY TO NOT BE CHARGED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For people who accidently cause gbh for self Defense or under duress, why should innocent people under pressure/ under duress get charge for this? we are asking for them to be changed, for those who acted under self defense or under duress to not be charged and offered counseling and help!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
